Class [http://nul.googlecode.com/svn/doc/symbols/_nul.expression.html nul.expression]

= Introduction =

Nul expressions can represent everything that can be represented by NUL. First, the NulObject but also the NulKnowledge or the NulPossible, object associated with a NulKnowledge.

Writing a NUL "program" is just, indeed, to describe a NUL expression.
